nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_484
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The police had the photograph of the missing girl enlarged so that they could recognize her easily.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_485
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: When I go to work, I prefer to take a bus rather than drive and that morning was no exception.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_486
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: When he saw his granddaughter coming into the house (Seeing his granddaughter coming into the house), the old man got to his feet and moved several steps unexpectedly as if he could walk by himself.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_487
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: At that time we focused our attention on that painting without noticing anything unusual around us, and we can't offer any additional details.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_488
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The two robbers' methods suggested they might be the same men who had committed a number of robberies in the area over the past few months.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_489
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It's a question we have to face no matter how unpleasant it is.
